title: Mindful pregnancy : meditation, yoga, hypnobirthing, natural remedies, nutrition - trimester by trimester
author: Donegan; Tracy; Dk Publishing; Inc
cleaned_text: Trimester by trimester, this beautiful book gives safe yoga, meditation, natural remedies, nutrition, and hypnobirthing techniques to match each stage of pregnancy. Encouraging, practical advice from ... a midwife and positive birth expert will help mothers-to-be troubleshoot pregnancy aches and pains with appropriate exercises, quell morning sickness with natural remedies and food, and prepare their bodies and minds safely and healthily for childbirth using strengthening exercises
